725202f-b.text:
31st Street, west side, between 24th and Hoyt Avenues, showing a group of two-story homes being demolished, where a publio playground was later built. View 1 is south from the former Dorothy Place toward Woyt Avenue; view 2 is across the I.R.T. elevated from 24th Road, just east of 31st Street; view 3 shows frame houses at the S.W. corner of 24th
Road.
P. L. Sperr  September 20, 1934
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2,3
